fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Magical Arsenal: The first time you empty your hand, draw 3 cards immediately with at least 1 attacking card.
- Ancient Arcana: Gain 2 non-special cards of your choice. [Activates D5]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Combust: Pick a non-special attacking card in your hand. Attack yourself, and the 2 players next to you on the playerlist with that attack, including modifiers. [1 use, Unique]  
- Summon: Draw 2 non-duel won cards of your choice at the end of this phase. Replaces your regular draw. Cannot be affected by Replenish! Max 1 special. [1 use, Unique] 
- Firestrike: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
